ðŸ“– Summary: OpenXRay is an improved and extended version of the X-Ray Engine used in the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. game series. It offers 64-bit support, improved performance, bug fixes, new features for modders, and cross-platform compatibility. The project aims to provide a solid platform for modding and enhance the player experience while maintaining compatibility with the original games.
